mapper.select: SELECT a.article_id, a.channel_name, a.theme_name, a.site_name, a.title, a.content, a.excerpt, a.author, a.avatar, a.article_url, a.view_count, a.reply_count, a.last_reply_author, a.last_reply_time, a.top, a.good, a.is_delete, a.show_content, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.weight, a.up, a.down, b.user_id "user.userId", b.username "user.username", b.avatar "user.avatar" FROM article a LEFT JOIN `user` b on a.author = b.username WHERE article_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET view_count = #{viewCount}, reply_count = #{replyCount}, last_reply_author = #{lastReplyAuthor}, last_reply_time = #{lastReplyTime}, top = #{top}, good = #{good}, weight = #{weight}, up = #{up}, down = #{down}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
